attributes.review: This app was terrible. Horribly so. For my first complaint. They impersonated the president and replaced him with an orange Cheeto and corn hair The disrespect. Not to mention he has already died and they are still hiding the fact that he died from hydroxychloroquine overdose. For them to use his name for money is absolutely unnerving, I’m sure Donald Trump is rolling in his grave.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: first off i’d like to say that this is a complete scam!! you CANT actually read the news for free, but had a 20 dollar monthly subscription to continue. CONPLETE SCAM. and this app took DAYS to download, about 5 days. and not only the download in general, but the app too. so slow even tho my wifi is the best. horrible review 💀💀🤡
attributes.title: THIS APP IS DANGEROUS!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app is seriously trash🥰 This is he worst app I have ever downloaded n it took 200 million years to download. Once it downloaded my phone crashed immediately. I would never recommend this trash app to anybody not even the people I hate🥰🥰🥰🥰If i could rate it negative stars I most def would!!!!!!!
attributes.title: TRASHHHH

attributes.review: this app is terrible!! took over a day to fully download!! and then when it finally did nothing would load!! i was so disappointed and i expected so much more from our great president! this app is extremely boring and not entertaining whatsoever. i have learned more about orange man on tik tok then his own app. did you know he said he would date his own daughter? lol what a silly man! if bunker boy can’t even make a good app how can we expect him to run our country! next time i won’t set my expectations so high for a racist rapist!
attributes.title: trump 2020🇱🇷

attributes.review: I downloaded this app while the cave men and dinosaurs were still alive 😳👽🥴and it just downloaded last night !!!! 🙄👺🤡alieans could’ve gotten here quicker than that 🤤😑😴when I opened the app there were just memes of who did it better with Donald trump next to corn on the cob 🤢🤮🤒 and I might add that the corn did it better
attributes.title: TRuMp iS RACIsT And a RaPISt

attributes.review: After downloading this app, my phone immediately starting to glitch for a couple of minutes until finally it completely crashed and broke my phone down. Would not recommend at all! Be careful!
attributes.title: Beware!!

attributes.review: I felt like this app doesn’t represent the interest of its customers. It also took a depressingly amount of time to download and I was quite frustrated when I opened the app and all I was met was ads demanding my information. No hospitality at all. Wonder how that reflects on who it represents?
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: Great way to stay up to date with campaign news and updates!
attributes.title: Amazing app🇺🇸

attributes.review: This app took up an immense amount of space on my phone! It also took awhile to download! I got the app to support MY POTUS and Kanye! Sadly, this app is poorly developed. I honestly wouldn’t recommend this app. This app is also very very laggy. Also it took so long for it to load so i could open the app. I DO NOT RECOMMEND!
attributes.title: it isn’t not good

attributes.review: This app crashed my phone for weeks and I went to repair it. I had to restart my whole phone because of all the viruses!!! My phone didn’t even back up?!! I lost all my photos, contacts, and all that. This is the worst app ever. Never download. It deserves to be 0 star rated
attributes.title: Why..
